errors.addressNotFound: Could not retrieve the blockchain address for sending funds. Apologies for any inconvenience.
errors.emailValid: Must be a valid email address
errors.failedPayment: Invalid payment details. Check your credit card and/or billing address details.
errors.minimumBid: Your bid must be at least {{amount}}
errors.bidLessThanHighestBid: Your bid was lower than the current high bid.
errors.minUSDC: Found balance of {{balance}} {{currency}}, but the minimum needed is {{min}} {{currency}}
errors.onlyLettersAndNumbers: Must contain only letters and numbers
errors.onlyLowercaseLettersAndNumbers: Only lowercase characters and numbers allowed
errors.paymentNotCreated: The payment could not be created. Please contact support.
errors.transferDeclined: Transaction was declined, or something went wrong during payment.
errors.transferNotFound: Transfer not found. If this was completed, keep checking the status.

bankInstructions.label: Bank Wire Instructions
bankInstructions.helpText: Below is all of the information you need to initiate a wire transfer. Keep in mind, your bank may use slightly different names for these details. May the odds be ever in your favor.
bankInstructions.notice: You're not done! Once you submit your payment info, we will share the information you need to bring to your bank to initiate a wire transfer. Once you complete payment below, you will have 7 days to submit payment before your winning bid is canceled.

bid.confirmation: I understand that I need to complete payment within 72 hours or I will forfeit my winning bid.
bid.description: Your card will be charged immediately on auction close if you place the winning bid.
bid.label: Your Bid
bid.success: You're the current high bidder for {{title}}

defaultCard.label: Default
defaultCard.helpText: Make card my default for purchases

fullName.label: Full Name
fullName.helpText: As it appears on your card

description.1: Your passphrase is used to approve every transaction.
description.2: It cannot be reset if lost.

passphrase.label: Passphrase
passphrase.enterPassphrase: Enter your passphrase to authorize this transaction.

card.label: Credit Card
card.helpText: Accepted for winning bids up to $3,000

crypto.label: Crypto Wallet
crypto.helpText: Accepted for all winning bids. Payment accepted in USDC from WalletConnect, MyAlgo, or Coinbase.

payWithCrypto.label: Pay with Crypto
payWithCrypto.helpText: We can only accept crypto payments in USDC-A.

tutorial.prompt: Don't have a Crypto Wallet yet?

instructions.label: If you already have a wallet
instructions.1: Click to connect and scan the QR code using your wallet's mobile app, OR copy the blockchain address to your clipboard.
instructions.2: Initiate the purchase, either by clicking the Purchase button or manually transferring funds to the copied address.
instructions.3: Submit your payment of {{price}} in USDC.
instructions.4: Check for payment. Once we receive your payment, you will be the new owner of the NFT.

createWallet.label: Create a Wallet
createWallet.link: Tutorial on creating a new account
createWallet.1: Install Algorand Wallet on your mobile device
createWallet.2: Create a new account with Algorand Wallet
createWallet.3: Add USDC by clicking Add new asset and searching for USDC

purchaseAlgos.label: Purchase ALGOs
purchaseAlgos.link: Tutorial on transferring cryptocurrency using Coinbase
purchaseAlgos.notice: Note: Fees are added during the swap
purchaseAlgos.1: Sign up for a Coinbase account
purchaseAlgos.3: Transfer ALGOs to your Algorand wallet

swapAlgos.label: Swap ALGOs for USDC-A
swapAlgos.notice: Beware of extra fees and slippage! Wallet needs to have enough to cover the item cost + fees.
swapAlgos.2: Select ALGOs as From and USDC as To

saveCard.label: Save my card for future purchases
